member.name: M:Email.Api.Controllers.ApiController.InitUserCredentials
member.summary: Must call within a controller action otherwise details are not avilable

member.name: T:Email.Api.OperationFilters.OptionOperationFilter
member.summary: This operation filter only works on types that are contained in a class. Optional values that are put as type parameters will not be properly displayed in Swagger, although they will work.
